item.title: ShinyProxy - 付費購買 Shiny Server Pro 的另一種選擇
在GCP上架設永久免費的 ShinyServer
R package - SRTtools
item.description: Introduction to SRTtools SRTtools is a R package that can simply adjst subtitles time, style and position for srt file. Package Setup install.packages("SRTtools") library(SRTtools) Examples Read srt file srt_path <- system.file("extdata", "movie.srt", package="SRTtools") srt <- srt.read(srt_path) > srt [1] "1" "00:00:25,525 --> 00:00:29,904" [3] "<i>This is the Asgardian" "refugee vessel </i>Statesman<i>.</i>" [5] "" "2" [7] "00:00:32,657 --> 00:00:36,119" "<i>We are under assault." Postpone subtitles 0.5 seconds later srt_later <- srt.

item.title: How to publish an R package to CRAN
R package - KeyboardSimulator
item.description: Introduction to KeyboardSimulator KeyboardSimulator is a package for R language that make users simulate keyboard event, cursor movement and mouse click with simple R function. This package provide 6 functions which are developed in C++: keybd.press() Simulate keyboard key presses. Multiple keys can be pressed simultaneously by using + as separator. keybd.release() Simulate the release of keyboard keys held by keybd.press. keybd.type_string() Type a string with simulated keyboard input. mouse.
